  • html {
  body {
    @include responsive-typography;
    @include colors;
    @include font;
    @include link;
  
    header, footer, section, article, aside, nav, figure {
      @include hide-title;
    }
    
    header {
      @include header;
    }
    
    section {
      &#player {
        @include player;
      }
      
      &#signup {
        @include signup;
      }
      
      &#menu {
        @include menu;
      }
    }
  }
}
